tutorial: How to set up a new Chart

paragraphs.text: Now we can go back to the Data Storage hierarchy and follow the Trading Mines Data branch until we find the Backtesting Session Reference node that matches the Backtesting Session we just came from.

We are almost there! Under the Backtesting Session Reference node you will see a Trading Mine Products node. Just like before, add a new Timeline Chart (donâ€™t forget to name it). Then create a reference between the Trading Mine Products node and the Layer Manager.
